Html:
Is there a way to save settings with a particular image/video? I see the option to load presets from metadata but I don't know how to get those presets included within the particular file...

otherwise I love the overall ability to save settings - makes it so much easier to setup VR Player for certain sets of images.

ps: the head-neck model is great!

I will update the documentation with the instructions as soon as possible.
In short, you'll need to use a plugin for adobe softwares (available in the source code)

You can also name a preset file with the same media file name and replace extension by .json.
Vrplayer search for presets in the same folder when opening a picture or a video file.

-Stephane

that makes sense - so after calibrating the settings - just save the preset with the same name as the file you were calibrating for
sweet thanks

No problem and here's the link for the documentation about XMP meta data: Content creators guide

-Stephane
